title: These jungle changes are more toxic and stupid than I gave it credit for.
body:
Yes this is a bloody fucking rant, those scuttle changes should have never been greenlighted. Early duelist junglers have become so meta that your game is an absolute guaranteed loss if you don't pick either {{champion:11}} {{champion:5}} or {{champion:77}}. 26 games lost in a row, IN A ROW, simply because in every game the enemy had one of those three champions.

3x the killscore? Doesn't matter.

got all three enemy inhibs down pre-20 minutes? Doesn't fucking matter!

Scored all objectives, baron and dragon? DOESN'T FUCKING MATTER!!

3 enemies inting and trying to FF? **DOESN'T FUCKING MATTER!!!!**

It doesn't matter what kind of advantage or how many we have, simply the enemy having one of those and us not is PROMISING them a free win. Why even play a game if i am doomed to lose it if i don't join one circlejerk or the other? what kind of bullshit is this? 

Has Riot not learned a single thing from the years this game has been run? A Meta that puts even one of those three, let alone all of them in pick or ban positions is toxic in itself. there is no argument and no justification for it, those champion's shouldn't be able to shift the entire course of a game solely by existing! For fucks sake, i can't believe im joining the circlejerk but fucking undo those scuttle changes. They are the worst thing you've done since the rengar rework, and nearly nobody believed that a fuckup of such scale was possible anymore.

This is a ridiculous disappointment. I've reached the point where I am scared to enter any game that isn't trollfest gathering aka draft pick. Fucking pull your shit together Riot, we can deal with your mistakes but we can't accept you not fixing them.

Edit; ofc people are gonna disagree in public. can't have a complaint that is against the very thing you so openly abuse. Fuck this, 26 losses and unless i put myself in the extremely uncomfortable position of playing those 3 circlejerk douchebags of a champ i won't get any less. League has lost all it's fun aspects and enforced to be played only for the win. Say and vote what you want, you know theres truth in this crap of a complaint.

replies.body:
I'm confused.

You say that the changes emphasize early game power, and that's why Yi, Udyr and Xin are strong, right?

But then, you say,

>3x the killscore? Doesn't matter.

>got all three enemy inhibs down pre-20 minutes? Doesn't fucking matter!

>Scored all objectives, baron and dragon? DOESN'T FUCKING MATTER!!

>3 enemies inting and trying to FF? DOESN'T FUCKING MATTER!!!!

It seems like you were able to win early game and get ahead, but you still lost? So then the early game isn't the problem?

The problem is regardless of how it is won or lost. the outcome is always the same with those two. my problem is that those jungle changes just made them into the freakshows they are now.

i can't play any games right now because unless the entire enemy team ffs, i lose every game i play if the enemy has one of those champs, completely regardless of how far ahead we get. 

i've suffered 26 losses in a straight row without a single win inbetween simply because the enemy had those 3 picked. the bullshit level on this meta is traumatizing.

You ever stop to think that it might be something your doing that results in your 26 losses rather then the games fault?  
Watch some of your replays, look for errors.
 Another really good option is to play those champions for several games, learn their strengths and you can also get some first hand experience on how other players will counter your champ.
Revert Scuttle changes entirely and bring back Summoner's Rift so we can have Jungle Diversity again.
Im not having issues with {{champion:28}}  vs all 3 of those champions you listed in the new jungle.
